description.value:
Requirements You are adjacent to a column of crates.

You attempt to topple a stack of heavy crates onto a foe. Attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:22] check.

Success You topple the crates toward a target within a @Template[type:line|distance:15]{15-foot line} from the column. The falling crates deal [[/r (3d10+6)[bludgeoning]]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save. A creature that critically fails is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. Any squares where crates crashed down become difficult terrain.

Failure You are unable to topple the crates.

Critical Failure The crates topple onto you instead, with the same effects as a success but affecting only you and your square.
